solution_line_template: The perimeter of the garden is {two_multiplier} * {garden_length} + {two_multiplier} * {garden_width} = {length_contribution} + {width_contribution} = <<{two_multiplier}*{garden_length}+{two_multiplier}*{garden_width}={perimeter}>>{perimeter} feet.
Minus the two gates, he will need at least {perimeter} - {small_gate_width} - {large_gate_width} = <<{fencing_needed}={fencing_needed}>>{fencing_needed} feet of fencing.
